name: APG: A Plane Game
description:
This is not the best game, It is also not the worst game, but it is A Plane Game. As of right now you fly through obstacles collecting coins to prevent yourself from blowing up and also collecting the best high-scores to boast to your friends.

Features include:

- 22 planes some reoccurring with different colorway's

- 10 different skyboxes

- differentiating obstacles 

-timer till self-destruction

Future updates

- Dog fight Game mode

- Different Difficulty's (not affecting obstacles, speed, or time)

- music by Bobby Henderson himself

- sfx for the coin, explosion, and getting close to the end of the timer

THIS GAME IS FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY
